title: High Risk Asset Disclaimer
content: Before proceeding with crypto-related transactions, you must verbally confirm the user understands the risks. State: 'Please be aware that crypto assets are volatile and not covered by traditional deposit insurance. Do you wish to proceed?'

title: Crypto Card Activation Guide (Error 505)
content: For 'Error 505', the user's mobile device clock is out of sync with network time. Instruct the user to go to their device's Date & Time settings and enable 'Set time automatically'. This will resolve the time-based token generation failure. Do not ask them to reinstall the app.

title: Handling Frustrated Customers
content: When sentiment is negative, use empathetic language. Phrases like 'I understand this is frustrating' and 'Let's solve this together' can help de-escalate the situation. Acknowledge the problem before providing a solution.
